english.segment1: Any crown I've ever worn. I lay it down. Any praise I've ever gained. I give it all to You. For there's nothing in this world. That can compare. For You alone are worthy. You alone are worthy
english.segment2: You are near to all who call. Upon Your name. Ever giving, ever loving. You remain the same. For You open up Your hands. And satisfy. I give You all the glory. Give You all the glory
english.segment3: You are worthy oh Lord. Of all honour. You are worthy to receive. All praise. In Your presence I live. And with all I have to give. I will worship You..
english.segment4: Honour You. Glorify Your holy name. I will worship You. Honour You. Glorify Your holy name
